verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:13
verses.text: And he said, Well; I will make a league with thee: but one thing I require of thee, that is, Thou shalt not see my face, except thou first bring Michal Saul’s daughter, when thou comest to see my face.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:14
verses.text: And David sent messengers to Ish–bosheth Saul’s son, saying, Deliver me my wife Michal, which I espoused to me for an hundred foreskins of the Philistines.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:15
verses.text: And Ish–bosheth sent, and took her from her husband, even from Phaltiel the son of Laish.
